Package com.BrickBreaker.element.brick

Class Crack

java.lang.Object
com.BrickBreaker.element.brick.Crack
public class Crack
extends java.lang.Object
This is the Crack class to store the variable to make the crack effect on the brick. The Crack class is separated from Brick class so that any other brick can use it without extend Brick class.
Since:
3/11/2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
Alden Sia Zheng Heng
